title: Cameron Weiss (Weiss Watch Company)
description: Watchmaker Cameron Weiss, of Weiss Watch Company, comes by to explain how he built his Mercedes 4x4, why he loves driving his 1959 Beetle, and everything you want to know about watches: how they were made last century, how they make them now, wy some cost as much as a house, and what you should buy if you have $50, or $500,000. It's an incredible kind of engineering that parallels the car world clearly.  Sitting in with us again is Nic Cuarta, of Bee Line Coffee.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
